ðŸ“– Summary: Hono is a small, ultrafast web framework built on Web Standards, designed for building web applications and APIs. It boasts a lightweight footprint, ultrafast routing, and multi-runtime support, allowing the same code to run on various platforms like Cloudflare Workers, Deno, and Node.js. It includes built-in middleware and excellent TypeScript support for a delightful developer experience.
